TechFest 2024 - Website Design Competition

Create, Design, Showcase!

Event Details

Date of Event

12th November 2024

Coordinators

Student: Vivek Kumar Ray

Teacher: Prof. John Doe

About the Event

The Website Design Competition at TechFest 2024 is a platform where creativity meets technology. Aspiring designers will have the chance to showcase their skills by building innovative websites that reflect modern web design trends and principles.

Participants will compete to create the most visually appealing and functional websites, demonstrating their proficiency in front-end design, user experience, and web technologies. It's a fantastic opportunity to collaborate, innovate, and win exciting prizes!

Rules and Regulations

  • Participants must be current university students.
  • Teams should consist of 3-5 members.
  • Websites must be designed from scratch; no pre-made templates allowed.
  • Teams will have a fixed amount of time to complete their designs.
  • All decisions made by the judges are final.
